title: Bachelor's Simone Ormesher is already back to her pre-pregnancy weight eight days after birth
text:
She welcomed her first child, daughter Gracie-Mae, last week.

And on Wednesday, just eight days after giving birth, The Bachelor's Simone Ormesher revealed that she's already back to her pre-pregnancy weight.

Taking to Instagram, the new mother posed up for a mirror selfie in a crop top, writing in part of her post: 'I am so happy with the progress of my body.'

'So happy with the progress of my body': The Bachelor's Simone Ormesher reveals she's already back to her pre-pregnancy weight just EIGHT DAYS after giving birth (pictured L, while pregnant and R, on Wednesday)

'Eight days PP (postpartum) I am so happy with the progress of my body it is bloody amazing how it all works, especially to think I had Gracie-Mae inside there last Tuesday,' Simone's post began.

'Throughout my pregnancy I didn't really work out too much as I lost all motivation for fitness,' she said.

She added that she made sure to watch her diet while pregnant and believes that it's helped her bounce back after having her child.

New addition! She welcomed her first child, daughter Gracie-Mae, just last week

How she did it: She added that she made sure to watch her diet while pregnant and believes that it's helped her bounce back after having her child

'But I did continue to eat as well as I could throughout my entire pregnancy and also used creams on my stomach twice a day and I really believe that's what has helped me go back to my pre-pregnancy weight.'

At the weekend, Simone posed up for a body shot just three days after giving birth.

In the post, she said she had been emotional and that her breasts were 'hurting like a motherf**ker.'

Candid: At the weekend, Simone posed up for a body shot just three days after giving birth (pictured). In the post, she said she had been emotional and that her breasts were 'hurting like a motherf**ker'

'I will be taking it super easy and soaking in mum life for the next six weeks but focusing on clean eating and then will slowly get back into my fitness routine once my mind and body is healed,' Simone said.

Simone announced the birth of Gracie-Mae on Thursday, taking to Instagram to share sweet snaps of her newborn.

She said that her baby was admitted to the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit.

'We could not have asked for a more stronger, amazing baby girl we are so in love,' part of Simone's post read, with Simone sharing Gracie-Mae with partner Matt Thorne.
description: She welcomed her first child last week. And on Wednesday, The Bachelor 's Simone Ormesher revealed that she's already back to her pre-pregnancy weight, just eight days after giving birth.
